body:
You should be able to get it manually via: http://localhost:8080/UI/acsrf/other/genForm/

hrefId will be the messageId of the history item for which you want the form made.

Are you using Windows?

I just did a quick bit of testing with this. It seems like a few bugs might be in play here.
1. The nonce is rejected because the PATHs don't match due to a missing leading slash:

>30981 [ZAP-ProxyThread-1] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce path was OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/ but call was for /OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/ in request from 127.0.0.1

When Firefox (that's what I was using) gets this reset/rejection from ZAP it tries hard to resolve localhost and ends up with www.localhost.com (I think).

2. The URL contains a double slash due to this code: https://github.com/zaproxy/zaproxy/blob/develop/src/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/api/API.java#L545-L547 at 545 the path ends in a slash but at 547 a second one is added (before the question mark and params).
3. I also noticed that all 10 proxy threads warn in the logs (which seems a bit strange):

> 30981 [ZAP-ProxyThread-1] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce path was OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/ but call was for /OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/ in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31018 [ZAP-ProxyThread-2] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31058 [ZAP-ProxyThread-3] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31095 [ZAP-ProxyThread-4] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31132 [ZAP-ProxyThread-5] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31171 [ZAP-ProxyThread-6] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31206 [ZAP-ProxyThread-7] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31241 [ZAP-ProxyThread-8] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31275 [ZAP-ProxyThread-9] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1
> 31290 [ZAP-ProxyThread-10] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.extension.api.API  - API nonce bda18a667c68fe3b not found in request from 127.0.0.1

4. If I replace the nonce with my current key the request seems to work as expected (which is just further proof of no. 1....from my PoV):
http://localhost:8080/OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/?apikey=mycurrentkey&hrefId=12

http://www.localhost.com:8080/OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/?apikey=myapikey&hrefId=4

myapikey: from "Options-->API --> API KEY"

Changing URL as per point 4 above did not help
Did you also change the hostname (to localhost)?

issue.title: Correct creation of API URLs with nonces

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Change API to not add an extra slash (before the query component) and to
create the nonce with the expected path (slash at the beginning).
Add tests to assert the expected behaviour.

Fix #3633 - "Generate Anti-CSRF Test Form" not working

body:
my post request have the URL http://servername/mitcsrf/Default.aspx

"Generate Anti-CSRF Test Form" I changed as below. I still have same problem.
http://www.localhost.com:8080/OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/?apikey=myapikey&hrefId=16

Please let me know, if I need to do further changes to URL

Is there a way I can install 2.5.0

You need to change the URL to match ZAP's address:
http://localhost:8080/OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/?apikey=myapikey&hrefId=16
(Assuming that ZAP is listening on localhost:8080)

If that still fails you need to ensure that you are allowed to access the API (in case you are accessing ZAP remotely from other machine than the one that ZAP is running). [1]

> Is there a way I can install 2.5.0

Yes, you can still use an older version:
https://github.com/zaproxy/zaproxy/releases/download/2.5.0/ZAP_2.5.0_Cross_Platform.zip
(This one doesn't require installation, just unzip and run.)

[1] https://github.com/zaproxy/zaproxy/wiki/FAQapikey
@kingthorin regarding 3., that's the browser retrying the requests.

>@kingthorin regarding 3., that's the browser retrying the requests.

Ok thanks, that makes sense.

@ArunObappa 
> "Generate Anti-CSRF Test Form" I changed as below. I still have same problem.
> http://www.localhost.com:8080/OTHER/acsrf/other/genForm/?apikey=myapikey&hrefId=16

Drop the "www." and ".com".

Thanks thc202 for older version !

Thanks kingthorin, works after dropping  "www." and ".com"
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
